Description of incident: "What Happened?We recently learned that unauthorized third parties accessed Rite Aid Online Store's e-commerce platform and acquired certain personal information of customers who manually entered their payment card details at the online store between January 30, 2017 and April 11, 2017.What Information Was Involved?The personal information that may have been affected includes your name, address, email address, and payment card data, including credit card number, expiration date, and card verification number."
